A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: You could easily tell tgere was no cohesive plan from the last movie.  Rian Johnson proceeded to trash every bit of build up Abrams left us in TFA\, and then proceeded to destroy the legacy of the movies prior to it.  With gaping plot holes\, forced comedy\, and the worst chase scene in cinematic history its a disgrace to even have it labeled as star wars.
